name: ZurWeb
tagline: Uruguay Web Design and Web development Studio.
description:
We are a web and graphic design studio in Uruguay created in 2008 specialized in web development with CMS interfaces, online stores design, online catalogs, websites for companies, online marketing and online campaigns.
Our goal it's be a reference in Uruguay as an agent of change for all organizations in the field of internet presence. Giving tools, training and ideas that improved the growth capacity of our clients, increasing the potential of their resources.
